now

while the weather can be pretty nice
here

i'm taking my dog to the vet

that's why i'm taking him to the vet

well he's not that way anymore
he sounds like a real menace he

i can't deny that good luck with the vet

it is identified by its muscular tails
strong back legs large feet
short fur and long pointed ears

that sounds great see you in your sun

soon

and in the winter it snows in some

not before midnight then let's stay in

haven't washed the dishes and cleaned

yes i promise just 30 more minutes

you are welcome all the time

he is seven years old i hope i have

it's south of here

three blocks south and one block east

hurry up i don't want to be late
today you will have a family reunion

yes i haven't seen my family in over a

and we are also busy all the time
even busy you should have some days off

you should balance between family and

will all people join yes
my grandparents my parents my younger

elder sisters also my uncle
and his wife and their children
you mean that uncle thomas
of course he's never missed a reunion
will he drink this year hopefully my

but we'll see this could be interesting
come on let's get in the car i

wow you made so many copies of photos

yeah i always take a lot of photos when

what are you going to do with them keep

yes i will keep some photos the

i guess that will make them very happy

yes you are right they're always eager

just same as they got on holiday with us
because i often write a trip route

she'll be very glad to read your

yeah that will make their day

i have to do the laundry mop the floor

only housework i think you can do it

oh you don't know right now i share the

and if she comes home and finds i

she would get really mad at me
well i feel sorry for you maybe next
time when you're not
busy

hi lucy i thought you've gone to russia
no
i'm still waiting for my visa
you are immigrating right
yeah my husband applied for my visa last
january well it's been nearly a year
do you know how much longer you'll have

i don't have a clue
the official says that i'll have to wait
for at least another
two months before the process can be
finalized
so who knows how long that will
well i didn't know going to russia would
be such an ordeal
your husband must miss you very much
i miss him too well
i hope you two will be together soon
thank you
hello i see you have been sitting here
for a long time
who are you waiting for
i'm waiting for a girl i met last night
she said to meet each other here at five

but it's six now you've been sitting
there for an
hour just waiting for her
how much longer are you going to wait
for her
don't be a fool come home with me
instead
and have a drink
that sounds like a good idea

only five minutes
great let's go
don't forget to give us a like
